title: Aries and Virgo Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: If both signs appreciate each other's differences, they can make it work.
steps.content: If both signs appreciate each other's differences, they can make it work. An earth sign, Virgos possess a practical, realistic view of the world, and they value stability in their relationships. A fire sign, Aries is always looking for passion and excitement in life and relationships. They may have their differences, but they're also both hardworking and organized. Together, they can motivate each other to accomplish their goals and build a life they've always dreamed of living. [1] X Research source Aries is a cardinal sign, which makes them independent and confident leaders. They like making the first move in relationships, which works well for a Virgo (who may be slightly shy). [2] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Virgo is a mutable sign, which compels them to be flexible and empathetic about others' needs. They'll be happy to give Aries the encouragement and support they need to accomplish their ambitious goals.

steps.title: These two can learn a lot from each other's different emotional styles.
steps.content: These two can learn a lot from each other's different emotional styles. Virgo takes their time to consider how they're feeling before they act on their emotions. Aries, on the other hand, can be a little impulsive and may act upon their emotions without reflection. Though these differences can drive them apart if they're not careful, they can also help both partners grow in new ways. [3] X Research source Aries can learn a lot from Virgo's more mellow emotional style. If they take some time to reflect upon how they're feeling, they can avoid getting worked up unnecessarily. Virgo can learn a thing or two from Aries' intensity. They'll benefit from embracing their own passionate emotions and remembering that not all feelings have to be logical.

steps.title: These two need to be patient with each other in the bedroom.
steps.content: These two need to be patient with each other in the bedroom. Otherwise, Aries might move a little too fast for a careful Virgo. As a cardinal sign, Aries is pretty forward. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Their bold and direct approach may turn off a Virgo. Unlike Aries, Virgo likes to get to know someone before they show their sexual side. These two will get more comfortable with each other if they talk openly about their desires and respect each other's needs. [5] X Research source As a mutable sign, Virgo is open to trying new things. If Aries gives them the time they need to feel comfortable, they might be surprised by how adventurous Virgo is.

steps.title: If this pair isn't careful, they may be prone to arguments.
steps.content: If this pair isn't careful, they may be prone to arguments. Aries is always looking for a debate, and they might even show their love by picking a fight. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. They're ruled by Mars, the planet of action and aggression, after all. Virgo often strives for perfection in their relationships and might critique their partner often. [7] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication and information, they're always focused on the details that need improving. [8] X Research source These two will need to cool off and leave each other be if they want to make things work. Aries can resist picking unnecessary fights, and Virgo can relax and let Aries do things their way.

steps.title: Aries and Virgo are both honest signs, so trust won't be a problem.
steps.content: Aries and Virgo are both honest signs, so trust won't be a problem. Virgo is known for being a very loyal sign in relationships. An earth sign, they want a stable relationship above all else and wouldn't dream of messing that up. Aries may be more passionate and intense, but they also value honesty (even when it hurts). [9] X Research source They'll let Virgo know what's on their mind and won't be interested in deception or mind games.

steps.title: These two both value hard work and dedication.
steps.content: These two both value hard work and dedication. The first sign of the zodiac, Aries is a visionary leader. They're often quite ambitious, with big dreams that they're capable of seeing through and achieving. Similarly, Virgo's quick-thinking mind and eye for detail make them uniquely capable of setting their plans in motion. Both signs are willing to work harder than anyone to achieve their goals, and their shared dedication will strengthen their bond. This pair will have no problem making their relationship goals a reality, whether that be getting an apartment together or even starting a small business.
